title: Bedazzled Nectar
summaries: The Bedazzled Nectar is a pet-summoning item that spawns a Glittery Butterfly pet to follow the player around. The Bedazzled Nectar has a chance of being sold by the Traveling Merchant for 1 PC.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons a pet butterfly
'Only the best, most exquisite flower excrement!'
statistics.Buy: 1 PC
statistics.Sell: 20 GC
